attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Artificial Intelligence (A.I.) sprang from British computing enthusiasts like Babbage and professionals like Turing giving us the world lead by the end of the war.

Unfortunately there was insufficient foresight to pursue it and Colossus was dismantled and its secrets with it.

The USA pushed ahead coining 'A.I.' in 1956.

The government has a duty to research,  develop, build and contain Superintelligence -which enthusiasts in Artificial General Intelligence (A.G.I.) think is imminent, but which no A.I. academic department is attempting anywhere.

Should this emerge is less happier lands we would be at its mercy.

Should we build it we would be able to fix world problems like ill health, climate change, conflicts, & poverty  and carry our civilisation to space, at dramatic speed.
All funding for all other projects should take second place to this as it will make them obsolete.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
